measured the waters…in the hollow of his hand. God created Earth's great oceans as easily as a man cups his hand and fills it with water. He created "heaven with the span" as easily as a man measures a household object with a ruler. All of creation, formed by him with exactness (measured), is held in the hollow of his hand, meaning he is aware of and protective of all.

comprehended the dust of the earth in a measure. This phrase emphasizes that the Lord knows everything from the largest of his creations to the smallest (Mosiah 4:9).
